p: The EOs were individually tested against Escherichia coli ATCC 10536, Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC BAA-1026), Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 11774), Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Abaetetuba (ATCC 35640), and Candida albicans (ATCC 10231). All the strains were purchased from the American Type of Culture Collection (ATCC, Manassan, USA) and maintained in the Laboratories of the Universidad TÃ©cnica del Norte, Ecuador. E. coli, S. aureus, and B. subtilis strains were grown on nutrient agar; C. albicans strain was grown on malt agar; S. enterica was grown on trypticase soy agar.
